name: metric-imperial-converter
description: Chrome extension to convert between metric and imperial units

scripts.init:safari: mkdir -p src/safari && xcrun safari-web-extension-converter src/ --project-location src/safari --app-name 'Metric Imperial Converter' --bundle-identifier 'com.philippberner.metric-imperial-converter' --no-open
scripts.build:safari: cd src/safari/Metric\ Imperial\ Converter && xcodebuild -project 'Metric Imperial Converter.xcodeproj' -scheme 'Metric Imperial Converter (macOS)' -configuration Release
scripts.build:safari-app: mkdir -p dist/safari && cp -R src/safari/Metric\ Imperial\ Converter/build/Release/*.app dist/safari/
scripts.build: npm run build:chrome && npm run build:safari && npm run build:safari-app
